1. Insurers Are Dropping Homeowners as Climate Shocks Worsen  The New York Times
  2. Your Home-Insurance Bill Has Only One Way to Go: Up  The Wall Street Journal
  3. New Data Reveal Climate Change-Driven Insurance Crisis is Spreading  Senate Budget Committee
  4. The three reasons home-insurance bills are only getting worse  The Independent
